meaningMnemonic: 酌む means "to serve" and the kanji 交 means <kanji>mix</kanji>. What happens if you serve and mix together? You're going <vocabulary>to pour each other a drink</vocabulary> because you plan  <vocabulary>to drink together</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic:
You haven't learned this reading for 交 yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

All the bars are closed so you and your friends are going <vocabuarly>to drink together in your <reading>ca</reading>r (か). You set up a little bar in the back of your car and settle down for some drinks. It's cramped but cosy.</vocabuarly>
otherMeanings: To Pour Each Other A Drink
